sources.description:
PizzaFLIX Presents CLASSIC MOVIE MONDAY
Stars: Vivian Duncan, Rosetta Duncan, Lawrence Gray
Director: Sam Wood

Set in the world of musical revues, the film follows a pair of talented siblings‚Äîportrayed by Rosetta Duncan and Vivian Duncan, better known as The Duncan Sisters‚Äînavigating ambition, love, and loyalty as they try to make it big on stage. Known for its lively performances and early synchronized sound, the film blends comedy and music with the stylish energy of the Jazz Age. 

Lawrence Gray co-stars as the love interest caught between the two, while Benny Rubin and Jed Prouty add comedic flair to the supporting cast.

üé≠ Subscribe for more Oscar-winning films, vintage musicals, and Pre-Code Hollywood gems!

Adapted by Joseph Farnham from a story by Helen and Charles Kaufman at a time when Hollywood was racing into the talkie era, this production captures the sparkle and optimism of pre-Code musicals. With upbeat numbers, vintage fashion, and theatrical flair, it‚Äôs a feel-good time capsule of 1929 entertainment.
